alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 01 at 2:30PM MDT until November 03 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central and Southern Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills, including the Interstate 80 Summit between Laramie and Cheyenne, and the Bordeaux Interchange along Interstate 25 between Chugwater and Wheatland. * WHEN...Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
